code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Note(_ref){var notes=_ref.notes,onDeleteNote=_ref.onDeleteNote,activeNote=_ref.activeNote;var navigate=useNavigate();var note=notes.find(function(note){return note.id===activeNote;});function handleEditClick(){navigate("/".concat(activeNote,"/edit"));}function handleDeleteClick(){var answer=window.confirm("Are you sure?");if(answer){onDeleteNote(activeNote);navigate('/');}}var lastModified=new Date(note.lastModified).toLocaleString('en-US',{month:'long',day:'numeric',year:'numeric',hour:'numeric',minute:'numeric',hour12:true});function createMarkup(){return{__html:note.body};}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"note-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"note-head",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"temp",style:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"title",children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{className:"save-date",children:lastModified})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"editButton",onClick:handleEditClick,children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"deleteButton",onClick:handleDeleteClick,children:"Delete"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"body",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:createMarkup(),style:{padding:"10px"}})]});}export default Note;
